name: JDO
description:
We are JDO. We’re here to design tomorrow, today. We help brands get ahead - and stay ahead – in a world of constant change. As the pace of life accelerates, identifying and meeting tomorrow’s needs matters more than ever before. We believe in a new vision of tomorrow. Tomorrow is borderless and boundaryless.
In tomorrow’s world, the old silos and demarcations are becoming increasingly meaningless. That’s why we’ve always worked across disciplines.
